extends java.lang.Object

    Manages - Images - Files (js, pdf, css...) on a local web server

    1.0.3

    Carl Samson

      • getInstance

        public static CmsStaticContentFileManagerImpl getInstance()

      • addFile

        public void addFile(java.lang.String merchantStoreCode,
                    com.salesmanager.core.model.content.InputContentFile inputStaticContentData)
             throws com.salesmanager.core.business.exception.ServiceException

        Method to add static content data for given merchant.Static content data can be of following type 

         1. CSS and JS files
 2. Digital Data like audio or video

        Merchant store code will be used to create cache node where merchant data will be stored,input data will contain name, file as well type of data being stored.

        Specified by:
        addFile in interface FilePut
        Parameters:
        merchantStoreCode - merchant store for whom data is being stored
        inputStaticContentData - data object being stored
        Throws:
        com.salesmanager.core.business.exception.ServiceException
        See Also:

      • addFiles

        public void addFiles(java.lang.String merchantStoreCode,
                     java.util.List<com.salesmanager.core.model.content.InputContentFile> inputStaticContentDataList)
              throws com.salesmanager.core.business.exception.ServiceException

        Method to add files for given store.Files will be stored in Infinispan and will be retrieved based on the storeID. Following steps will be performed to store static content files

      • Merchant Node will be retrieved from the cacheTree if it exists else new node will be created.
      • Files will be stored in StaticContentCacheAttribute , which eventually will be stored in Infinispan
Specified by:
addFiles in interface FilePut
Parameters:
merchantStoreCode - Merchant store for which files are getting stored in Infinispan.
inputStaticContentDataList - input static content file list which will get InputContentImage stored
Throws:
com.salesmanager.core.business.exception.ServiceException - if content file storing process fail.
See Also:
InputStaticContentData, StaticContentCacheAttribute

  • getFile

    public com.salesmanager.core.model.content.OutputContentFile getFile(java.lang.String merchantStoreCode,
                                                                     com.salesmanager.core.model.content.FileContentType fileContentType,
                                                                     java.lang.String contentFileName)
                                                              throws com.salesmanager.core.business.exception.ServiceException
    Method to return static data for given Merchant store based on the file name. Content data will be searched in underlying Infinispan cache tree and OutputStaticContentData will be returned on finding an associated file. In case of no file, null be returned.
    Specified by:
    getFile in interface FileGet
    Parameters:
    store - Merchant store
    contentFileName - name of file being requested
    Returns:
    OutputStaticContentData
    Throws:
    com.salesmanager.core.business.exception.ServiceException
